attributes.action: Proper justice and punishment for child abusers and murderers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am utterley devasted about how some child abusers and murderers get away with their horrendous crimes so lightly in this country.
Due to the recent news of poor 'baby p' and Amy Howson who was just 16 months old when she was brutally murdered by her so called father James Howson.
I really think britain should fight for justice to help prevent these animals ever returning to be a risk again and also to prevent these things from happening the absolute best we can, the system is not working for so many defenceless babies and children...they need to be protected and those who dont protect them to stand before the courts and be served proper punishment...including 'professionals'
No parole

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
